text: The Back Breaker (Persian: Kamarshekan) is a 1951 Iranian comedy film directed by Ebrahim Moradi.Issari p.103 ==Cast== * Abdullah Basirat * Ahmad Emami * Reza Mirfattah * Ebrahim Moradi * Akhtar Partovi * Asghar Simyari == References == == Bibliography == * Mohammad Ali Issari. Cinema in Iran, 1900-1979.
